description: Try our easy to follow Easy Apple Tarts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easy Apple Tarts Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Put a pastry round onto a baking sheet, cover with apple and top with a second pastry round. Repeat. Drizzle with apple juices from pan. Serve with cream.
